SEARCH
Modul org.example.project_wobimich
Package org.example.project_wobimich.api

Klasse APIClient

java.lang.Object
org.example.project_wobimich.api.APIClient
Bekannte direkte Unterklassen:
AddressAPIClient, RealTimeMonitorAPIClient
public abstract class APIClient extends Object
Abstract base class for API clients communicating with external web services.

Provides shared logic for sending HTTP requests over a socket connection and retrieving the response body. Subclasses must define host, port, path, and how the socket is created (e.g., plain TCP or SSL).

    • createSocket

      protected abstract Socket createSocket(String host, int port) throws IOException
      Creates a socket connection to the given host and port.

      Subclasses define whether the connection is a TCP socket or a SSL socket.

      Parameter:
      host - the remote host to connect to
      port - the remote port to connect to
      Gibt zurück:
      an open Socket connected to the given host and port
      Löst aus:
      IOException - if the socket cannot be created

    • fetchAPIResponse

      public String fetchAPIResponse() throws IOException
      Sends an HTTP GET request to the configured API endpoint and returns the response body as a string.

      The HTTP header is skipped and only the response body (JSON) is returned. Chunk size lines (hexadecimal values) are ignored/skipped.

      Gibt zurück:
      the response body returned by the API
      Löst aus:
      IOException - if a network or stream error occurs
